name.baseName: Repair welding ; Metal products repair parts, general equipment repair parts, special equipment repair parts welding parts ; Structural steel electrodes (JXXX), molybdenum and chromium-molybdenum heat-resistant steel electrodes (RXXX), stainless steel electrodes (G/AXXX), overlay welding electrodes (DXXX), low-temperature steel electrodes (WXXX), cast iron electrodes (ZXXX), nickel and nickel alloy electrodes (NiXXX), copper and copper alloy electrodes (TXXX), aluminum and aluminum alloy electrodes (LXXX), special-purpose electrodes ( TSXXX) ; Dismantling, cleaning, welding (manual arc welding), installation, inspection and testing ; All sizes; NESPS2

修理焊接 ; 金属制品修理件、通用设备修理件、专用设备修理件焊接件 ; 结构钢焊条（JXXX）、钼和铬钼耐热钢焊条（RXXX）、不锈钢焊条（G/AXXX）、堆焊焊条（DXXX）、低温钢焊条（WXXX）、铸铁焊条（ZXXX）、镍和镍合金焊条（NiXXX）、铜和铜合金焊条（TXXX）、铝和铝合金焊条（LXXX）、特殊用途焊条（TSXXX） ; 拆除、清洗、焊接（手工电弧焊）、安装、检测试验 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及使用特定类型的焊条修理各种金属制品、设备和结构组件，这些焊条包括结构钢（JXXX）、钼和铬钼耐热钢（RXXX）、不锈钢（G/AXXX）、堆焊（DXXX）、低温钢（WXXX）、铸铁（ZXXX）、镍和镍合金（NiXXX）、铜和铜合金（TXXX）、铝和铝合金（LXXX）、特殊用途电极（TSXXX）。这些电极用于所有规模的作业，包括拆除、清洗、手工电弧焊、安装、检查和测试修理部件的过程。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码431-434文件，在完整版文件中第1027页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为结构钢焊条（JXXX）、钼和铬钼耐热钢焊条（RXXX）、不锈钢焊条（G/AXXX）、堆焊焊条（DXXX）、低温钢焊条（WXXX）、铸铁焊条（ZXXX）、镍和镍合金焊条（NiXXX）、铜和铜合金焊条（TXXX）、铝和铝合金焊条（LXXX）、特殊用途焊条（TSXXX），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (mobile dust purifier)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是其他（移动式烟尘净化器），其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isPlate electrostatic precipitator，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是板式，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isTubular filtration，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是管式，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSpray tower/water shock bath，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是喷淋塔/冲击水浴，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isMulti-tube cyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是多管旋风，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSingle cylinder (multiple cylinders in parallel) cyclone，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是单筒（多筒并联）旋风，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
